Comment 2: 
The Plan 9 compilers implement the pre-ANSI rules for arithmetic conversions,
which are usually called "unsigned-preserving".

And note that under the ANSI rules, the above comparison will be false if
sizeof(int) == sizeof(char).

I don't think it would be a lot of work to change cmd/cc but who knows what
would break (if anything).

For the curious, the code is in cmd/cc/sub.c:/^arith
